title: Use clang 8 to build CUDA in macOS CI
body_html:
Eigen gives third_party/eigen/Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/Half.h(508): error: explicit specialization of class "std::__1::numeric_limits<Eigen::half>" must precede its first use error when trying to compile it with clang 9. The solution seems to be using clang 8 to compile it instead.

Tested on both master and #8073 branch.
body_text:
Eigen gives third_party/eigen/Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/Half.h(508): error: explicit specialization of class "std::__1::numeric_limits<Eigen::half>" must precede its first use error when trying to compile it with clang 9. The solution seems to be using clang 8 to compile it instead.
Tested on both master and #8073 branch.
body:
Eigen gives `third_party/eigen/Eigen/src/Core/arch/CUDA/Half.h(508): error: explicit specialization of class "std::__1::numeric_limits<Eigen::half>" must precede its first use` error when trying to compile it with clang 9. The solution seems to be using clang 8 to compile it instead. 

Tested on both master and https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/8073 branch.
